technology: There were some audio issues at the beginning, but overall the participant did not experience any technical difficulties.
cur_neg_affect: The participant expresses some mild frustration about the pandemic still being around.
past_neg_affect: The participant recalls some mild frustration about the pandemic cancelling his friend's flight.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation with his partner, but does not go out of his way to build off of his partner's story.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and tries to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant is not at all defensive in justifying his beliefs/perspective.
questions: What were your first experience regarding COVID-19? (0:34:40)
How you adapted your work style depending upon that? (0:34:44)
What's your experience about the vaccination and the first two doses? (0:37:15)
If yes, what were the side effects and what's your perception regarding vaccination after that? (0:37:20)
vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are somewhat important.
booster_importance: The importance of boosters was not discussed at all.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance.
